subject: Re: Your new website design is ready : )

Also, if you have a look at the post loop on the six pages above, your name is showing up as the author. Can you please remove this? Cheers
@heath ok now.

Hello Heath,

And please add these under each sector

Education

Washrooms used at a high traffic level, API Commercial offers touch-less technology to prevent the spread of germs such as the washrooms becoming door-less entry, flushing toilets and urinals, dispense soap and paper and air blades to dry hands. LED light fittings and motion sensors reduce power usage, timer valves minimise the water usage and easy to clean fixtures make the cleaning experience like never before!

API has comprehensive experience in the refurbishment and construction of washrooms in education industry ensuring they will last the test of time. It is a proven factor, refurbished bathrooms increases a schools enrollments.

Retail

Customers rate their overall retail experience on the quality of the washroom facilities. Washrooms need to be suitable for all different ages and abilities, including facilities for the disabled and the children, but many also include break-out areas for shoppers to relax and refresh.

API has comprehensive experience in the refurbishment and construction of washrooms in retail industry ensuring a pleasant experience for your customers. We understand that retail and commercial washrooms need to serve many functions, they must be safe, hard-wearing, easy to clean yet attractive. They endure a high volume of traffic and stand up to vandalism. Our solutions and designs for retail washrooms are durable, functional and attractive.

Corporate

Corporate washrooms are a continuation of your brand. For visitors and staff your washroom facilities have a direct impact on morale. Corporate branding can continue through the washroom by way of colours or logos. Employees feel more valued when facilities are comfortable, clean and stylish. Staff satisfaction is enhanced, resulting in improved productivity.

API has comprehensive experience in the refurbishment and construction of washrooms working with corporate clients to ensure improvement to your brand and washroom experience.

Industrial

Industrial washrooms are a high demand and high traffic flow. For all site personnel, a clean and efficient function washroom improves your site performance. API Commercial offers touch-less technology to prevent the spread of germs, fixtures and fittings to reduce power and water usage and incorporating the use of ventilation and good lighting. Industrial Clients usually like to incorporate their colours or logos into their washrooms, have practical fixtures and fittings that are easy to clean dirt and grime off but also comfortable as employees need to take a break to refresh.

API has comprehensive experience in the refurbishment and construction of washrooms working with industrial clients ensuring they will last the test of time and are good quality to make sure employees feel valued.

Sports/Fitness

Sports washrooms need the capacity to cater for a consistent traffic level, API Commercial offers touch-less technology to prevent the spread of germs, dispense soap and paper and air blades to dry hands. LED light fittings and motion sensors reduce power usage, timer valves minimise the water usage and easy to clean fixtures. Gym rooms, change rooms and bench seating can also be incorporated to make the whole experience worth it!

API has comprehensive experience in the refurbishment and construction of washrooms in sporting industry ensuring they will last the test of time.

Public

Public washrooms are high abuse facilities, through innovation there is a range of solutions ti ensure these facilities are robust and can not be easily vandalised or damaged whilst providing a pleasant experience for the everyday user. API Commercial offers a range of options for these facilities including touch-less technology to prevent the spread of germs, fixtures and fittings to reduce power and water usage and incorporating the use of ventilation and good lighting.

API has comprehensive experience in the refurbishment and construction of washrooms working with Government Sectors and Councils ensuring they will last the test of time and are good quality to make sure the public feel valued.

We may update them in the next couple of weeks, but this is a start anyway......

Thanks.

Regards,

Ingrid Hobson

Sales Consultant

Hi Ingrid, 

Sure, confirming these updates have been made. With point 5, yes, please send through the specific points as they don't perfectly makes sense with the revised categories.

@heath ok now except this instruction number 5 "can we please change them to our 6 categories and place the correct points under each category"... a little bit confusing about what categories to be replace or add.

.5) Also on the About Us page down the bottom where it has the corportate, club, community etc, can we please change them to our 6 categories and place the correct points under each category. I can help if need be.

Thanks.

Another few updates to make:

  1. Can you please move 'Here's what we are known for' from the our work page to the 'About us' page.

  2. And replace tailor made solutions with 'Raising Washroom User Perceptions'

  3. And also the information under it, change to
    Our specialty is to perfectly transform the commercial wet areas in education, retail, corporate, industrial, sports/fitness and public environments. We specialise in the installation and supply of many services to transform your wet area to suit your needs.

    Our vision is to be a leading progressive wet area refurbishment company delivering quality on time with dedicated personnel to our loyal customers. Our team comprises of energetic, flexible, fast paced professionals who are always ready for challenges. We strive hard to deliver our goals in a timely fashion.

    We foster and rely on repeat business and are proud of our growing crowd of building owners, we aim to provide personalised services to all our clients.



  4. McCarthy Catholic College Project - can you remove from Education and put under Non-washroom.



  5. Also on the About Us page down the bottom where it has the corportate, club, community etc, can we please change them to our 6 categories and place the correct points under each category. I can help if need be.



Thanks again

Regards,
